DOC.brief_summary: This study advocate Institute Basic Research Clinical Medicine , China Academy Chinese Medical Sciences December 2012 . It fund China major scientific technological specialize project 'significant new formulation new drug ' . The purpose study make cohort event monitor see whether Shenqifuzheng injection hospital result adverse event adverse drug reaction .
DOC.brief_title: A Registry Study Shenqifuzheng（a Chinese Medicine Injection）Used Hospitals China
DOC.detailed_description: It common Chinese Medicine Injection use hospital mainland China . However safety problem rise recent year . There could many uncertain factor influence Chinese Medicine Injection clinical practice . Safety surveillance Chinese Medicine injection important problem need sort large sample observational study . A registry study Shenqifuzheng injection safety surveillance 30000 patient conduct Jan.2013 Dec.2014 . Eligibility criterion Patients use Shenqifuzheng injection select hospital
